LanguageData.FueledResourceGenerator.label: fueled resource generator
LanguageData.FueledResourceGenerator.description: Slowly generates items every two days. Uses chemfuel instead of electricity and is a bit less effective.
LanguageData.ImprovedResourceGenerator.label: improved resource generator
LanguageData.ImprovedResourceGenerator.description: Slowly generates items every two days. Spawns 2,5 the amount as the normal generator
LanguageData.ResourceGenerator.label: resource generator
LanguageData.ResourceGenerator.description: Slowly generates items every two days.
